nodes.bodyText: Seems Helm 3 has its own understanding of where the comments should appear in a range loop. This is really hilarious. @madanadit
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -41,17 +29,30 @@ spec:
     role: alluxio-master
     app: alluxio
     release: alluxio
-    statefulset.kubernetes.io/pod-name: alluxio-master-0
+    statefulset.kubernetes.io/pod-name: alluxio-master-2
 ---
+# Source: alluxio/templates/master/service.yaml

+#
+
+

nodes.bodyText:
Seems they are generated in order but output separately. @madanadit
Not that this will corrupt the output template, but just an interesting caveat to note about Helm 3.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -72,17 +73,18 @@ spec:
     role: alluxio-master
     app: alluxio
     release: alluxio
-    statefulset.kubernetes.io/pod-name: alluxio-master-1
+    statefulset.kubernetes.io/pod-name: alluxio-master-0
 ---
+# Source: alluxio/templates/master/service.yaml

nodes.bodyText: Also the output are all trimmed and lost the ending empty row. That's fine to me as we are removing these from the code repo.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -103,6 +105,4 @@ spec:
     role: alluxio-master
     app: alluxio
     release: alluxio
-    statefulset.kubernetes.io/pod-name: alluxio-master-2
----
-
